trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály nem örökölhető.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A tracking service that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event to notify the runtime tracking infrastructure that the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> has changed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]A nyomkövetési szolgáltatás, amely megvalósítja a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>csatoló vált ki egy <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>esemény értesíteni a futásidejű követési infrastruktúra, amely a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>egy adott munkafolyamathoz <xref:System.Type>megváltozott.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>

trans-unit.source: The tracking service uses a ProfileUpdatedEventArgs to provide the workflow <xref:System.Type> and the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: A nyomkövetési szolgáltatás egy ProfileUpdatedEventArgs használatával adja meg a munkafolyamat <xref:System.Type>és az új <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>infrastruktúra nyomon követése a futtatókörnyezet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a ProfileUpdatedEventArgs when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Például a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>egy ProfileUpdatedEventArgs használja, amikor a riasztást a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>esemény.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: When it receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure will update the tracking profile for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type> in its profile cache.
trans-unit.target: Amikor megkapja a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>esemény, a futtatókörnyezet infrastruktúra követési frissíteni fogja a megadott munkafolyamat a nyomkövetési profil <xref:System.Type>profil gyorsítótárában.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor when you raise a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event inside a tracking service, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ha ez a konstruktor használ egy <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>esemény belül a nyomkövetési szolgáltatás, explicit módon be kell <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>és <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> előléptetése

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class that specifies a new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"> </xref> osztály, amely meghatározza egy új <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> a megadott munkafolyamat <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> is created with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> set to the specified <xref:System.Type> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> set to the specified profile.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>jön létre a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>be <xref:System.Type>és <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>beállítása a megadott profil.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of workflow for which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>munkafolyamat, amelynek a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> megváltozott.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the workflow Type.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja az új <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> a munkafolyamat-típus.

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Amikor a futásidejű követési infrastruktúra kap egy <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>esemény frissíti az új <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>a munkafolyamat <xref:System.Type>által <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> profil gyorsítótárában</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the workflow type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> a munkafolyamat-típushoz.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the workflow whose <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> should be updated.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a <xref:System.Type>a munkafolyamat, amelynek <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> frissíteni kell.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> specifies the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the tracking profile has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>Adja meg a munkafolyamat <xref:System.Type>a a nyomkövetési profil megváltozott.</xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> is set to the new tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>nyomon követéséhez profilt az új készletet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Amikor a futásidejű követési infrastruktúra kap egy <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>esemény frissíti az új <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>a munkafolyamat <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> profil gyorsítótárában</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>munkafolyamat.</xref:System.Type>
